Class AccountSystem

java.lang.Object
account.AccountSystem
public class AccountSystem extends Object
class for managaing accounts in the data base

  • Method Details

    • login

      public LoginStatus login(String hospitalID, String passwd)
      Logs in a user with a given hospital ID and password.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The ID of the hospital account.
      passwd - The password for the account.
      Returns:
      The status of the login attempt.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the accounts file is not found.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String oldPass, String newPass1, String newPass2)
      Changes the password of the user, ensure 1) user knows the old password 2) new password is different from old password 3) new password needs to be confirmed again
      Parameters:
      oldPass - The current password.
      newPass1 - The new password.
      newPass2 - The new password for confirmation.
      Returns:
      true if the password change is successful, false otherwise.

    • register

      public boolean register(String[] info, String role)
      Registers a new user with the provided information and role.
      Parameters:
      info - An array of user details.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., patient, doctor, pharmacist).
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteAccount

      public boolean deleteAccount(String id)
      Deletes an account associated with the given hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the account to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the account is deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • copyDir

      protected void copyDir(String src, String dest, boolean overwrite)
      copys the directory, needed for initalisation of doctors
      Parameters:
      src - the source directory
      dest - the destination directory
      overwrite - whether we are going to overwrite files into the desintation directory

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      gets the role of the account
      Returns:
      the role of the account

    • getID

      public String getID()
      gets the id of the account
      Returns:
      the id of the account
